item.title: How to Enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux
item.description: Video Greetings Hi all, in this video i will show how to enable Chaotic-AUR on Arch Linux. Chaotic-AUR is a unofficial user reposity for Arch Linux that has prebuilt binaries from the AUR. Several apps and custom kernels are available in this repo, and this includes kernels specially tuned for gamer and desktop use. I hope you enjoy! Links Arch Linux Arch Linux Wiki Arch Linux Wiki - Kernel Chaotic-AUR Steps 1.
